name: DUO gift package
description:
This Christmas you have the perfect gift for your beloved one or yourself! We proudly present the DUO pack - RĪGA Original and the Mono U neck t-shirt in one pack.
Chose your size from three different combinations:
- black RĪGA & grey Mono, 
- white RĪGA & black Mono, 
- grey RĪGA & white Mono. 

Share your RIGA at rigashirts.com.

name: RĪGA Original Unisex (Navy)
description: Proudly designed & manufactured in Riga, Latvia. RIGA Original Navy shirt with black RIGA lettering is now included among our standard colour collection shirts. • 100% cotton; • custom designed pattern • a light, thin fabric • treated with bioelements giving it a silky, fine finish Share your RIGA at rigashirts.com. See a detailed size chart.

name: RĪGA Original Ladies (White)
description: We are proud to present our new perfected shirts that are exclusively designed and produced in our city - Riga. Original RIGA shirt (Ladies) •100% cotton; •custom designed pattern •a light, thin fabric •treated with bioelements giving it a silky, fine finish This is RIGA. This is where we breathe, work and do life. This is a small tribute to our city. Share your RIGA at rigashirts.com. See a detailed size chart.

name: Mono V Unisex (Grey)
description:
MONO shirts are designed and manufactured in Riga from high quality cotton knitted in Latvia. They give you a tailored, pulled together look. Mono U and Mono V, that are sure to become a permanent fixture in your wardrobe.

•92% cotton, 8% polyester;
•custom designed pattern
•a light, thin fabric
•treated with bioelements giving it a silky, fine finish
•neck seam stiching in contrasting colour

name: RĪGA Map (Limited)
description: The Riga City District Map is another tribute to our city and its all 58 districts. In this graphic experiment typography meets topography. 200 limited edition maps, Hand-crafted silk screen, Four colours, 69 x 99 cm (27 x 39 inches), Delivered without frame. The elegant ash tree frame available upon request. Click to know more about the Riga City District Map.
